summary: Tested Coach Notifications feature for automatic alerts when clients make reservations. All backend APIs and frontend UI components are working correctly.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/payment-links returns coachNotificationEmail and coachNotificationPhone fields
Backend: PUT /api/payment-links accepts coachNotificationEmail field
Backend: PUT /api/payment-links accepts coachNotificationPhone field
Backend: PUT /api/payment-links accepts both notification fields together
Backend: POST /api/notify-coach returns formatted notification message with all client info
Backend: notify-coach message contains: client name, email, WhatsApp, offer, course, date, amount, code
Backend: notify-coach returns error when no notification config set
Backend: notify-coach works with only email configured
Backend: notify-coach works with only phone configured
Backend: Coach login with credentials coach@afroboost.com / afroboost123 works
Backend: Coach login fails with wrong credentials
Backend: Complete integration flow (configure -> trigger -> verify) works
Frontend: Coach login modal appears on triple-click of copyright
Frontend: Coach Dashboard loads after successful login
Frontend: Payments tab is accessible
Frontend: 'Notifications automatiques' section is displayed in Payments tab
Frontend: Email notification input field (data-testid='coach-notification-email') is present and functional
Frontend: WhatsApp notification input field (data-testid='coach-notification-phone') is present and functional
Frontend: Save button works and persists notification settings
Frontend: Helpful tip about EmailJS configuration is displayed
critical_code_review_comments: The notifyCoachAutomatic function in App.js (lines 2562-2617) correctly calls the /api/notify-coach endpoint and handles both email and WhatsApp notifications
The notification message format includes all required information: client name, email, WhatsApp, offer, course, date, amount, and reservation code
Note: Actual email/WhatsApp sending depends on EmailJS/Twilio configuration in the Campagnes tab - this is by design and documented in the UI

test_credentials.coach_access: Triple click on '© Afroboost 2026' copyright text at bottom of page
